name: Go2Words
0:
”Alexa, launch Go2Words”
”Share an inspirational message”
”Lighten my day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: go two words
des:
Get motivational posts for Alexa Echo Show. Go2Words, Instagram’s popular motivational account, provides high quality posts on inspiration, friendship, relationship, love, philosophy, career and other common topics.

If you just want to immerse in a good mood, play a Go2Words playlist. You can play:
• inspiration/motivation playlist
• Love playlist
• friendship playlist
• good morning playlist
• Life lessons playlist

Further you can get suggestions on themes that can help improve your confidence, bring empathy and positivity in your conduct, and spell purpose in everything you do in life. You can get
• Career-building advice
• Immerse and celebrate a philosophical mood
• View beautiful thoughts in friendship and family bonding

Go2Words is free to use. If you would want access to larger Go2Words thought collection, then follow us on Instagram @Go2Words.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
